languages.text: {name} фон Валанциус, соблазненн{mf|ый|ая} посулами ксеносской заразы, принял{mf||а} Поцелуй генокрада и примкнул{mf||а} к Конгрегации Хищной звезды. Он{mf||а} впустил{mf||а} в плоть сладость генетического совершенства, а в разум — песни блаженного Ангела. Распространяя учение Хищной звезды по мирам, кораблям и станциям, он{mf||а} молил{mf|ся|ась} о дне Освобождения, когда небесная рать Многорукого Императора прибудет в Простор. В сей славный день триумфа Вольного Торговца, как перв{mf|ого|ую} из святых Его, ждет великая награда за набожность и верность.

Swayed by the promises of the xenos infestation, {name} von Valancius received the Genestealer's Kiss and joined the Congregation of the Ravenous Star. {mf|He|She} let the sweetness of genetic perfection into {mf|his|her} flesh, and let the songs of the blessed Angel into {mf|his|her} mind. As {mf|he|she} spread the Ravenous Star's teachings across worlds, ships, and stations, {mf|he|she} prayed for the Day of Liberation, the day the heavenly host of the Many-Armed Emperor arrives in the Expanse. On that glorious day of triumph, the Rogue Trader, as the first of His saints, will be greatly rewarded for {mf|his|her} piety and loyalty.
languages.original_text: {name} фон Валанциус, соблазненн{mf|ый|ая} посулами ксеносской заразы, принял{mf||а} Поцелуй генокрада и примкнул{mf||а} к Конгрегации Хищной звезды. Распространяя учение Хищной звезды по мирам, кораблям и станциям, он{mf||а} молил{mf|ся|ась} о дне Освобождения, когда небесная рать Многорукого Императора прибудет в Простор. languages.text: Beeinflusst von den Versprechen der Xenos-Ausbreitung, erhielt {name} von Valancius den Kuss des Symbionten und trat der Kongregation des Gefräßigen Sterns bei. {mf|Er|Sie} ließ die Süße der genetischen Perfektion in {mf|sein|ihr} Fleisch und die Lieder des gesegneten Engels in {mf|seinen|ihren} Geist. Als {mf|er|sie} die Lehren des Gefräßigen Engels auf Welten, Schiffe und Stationen trug, betete {mf|er|sie} für den Tag der Befreiung, den Tag, an dem die himmlischen Heerscharen des vielarmigen Imperators in der Ausdehnung eintreffen würden. An diesem ruhmreichen Tag des Triumphs wird {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} als {mf|Erster|Erste} seiner Heilgen für {mf|seine|ihre} Frömmigkeit und Treue reich belohnt werden.
languages.original_text: Swayed by the promises of the xenos infestation, {name} von Valancius received the Genestealer's Kiss and joined the Congregation of the Ravenous Star. {mf|He|She} let the sweetness of genetic perfection into {mf|his|her} flesh, and let the songs of the blessed Angel into {mf|his|her} mind. As {mf|he|she} spread the Ravenous Star's teachings across worlds, ships, and stations, {mf|he|she} prayed for the Day of Liberation, the day the heavenly host of the Many-Armed Emperor arrives in the Expanse. On that glorious day of triumph, the Rogue Trader, as the first of His saints, will be greatly rewarded for {mf|his|her} piety and loyalty.

traits.locale_text: Beeinflusst von den Versprechen der Xenos-Ausbreitung, erhielt {name} von Valancius den Kuss des Symbionten und trat der Kongregation des Gefräßigen Sterns bei. {mf|Er|Sie} ließ die Süße der genetischen Perfektion in {mf|sein|ihr} Fleisch und die Lieder des gesegneten Engels in {mf|seinen|ihren} Geist. Als {mf|er|sie} die Lehren des Gefräßigen Engels auf Welten, Schiffe und Stationen trug, betete {mf|er|sie} für den Tag der Befreiung, den Tag, an dem die himmlischen Heerscharen des vielarmigen Imperators in der Ausdehnung eintreffen würden. An diesem ruhmreichen Tag des Triumphs wird {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} als {mf|Erster|Erste} seiner Heilgen für {mf|seine|ihre} Frömmigkeit und Treue reich belohnt werden.

languages.text: {mf|Appâté|Appâtée} par les promesses de l'infestation xénos, {name} von Valancius reçut le baiser du Genestealer et rejoignit la congrégation de l'Étoile vorace. {mf|Il|Elle} accueillit dans sa chair la suavité de la perfection génétique et dans son esprit les chants de l'ange béni. À mesure qu'{mf|il|elle} propageait les enseignements de sa nouvelle religion à travers les mondes, les vaisseaux et les stations, {mf|il|elle} priait ardemment pour qu'advienne le jour de la Délivrance, celui où l'armée céleste de l'Empereur aux mille bras arriverait dans les Étendues. En ce jour de gloire, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, {mf|le premier|la première} de Ses saints, serait généreusement {mf|récompensé|récompensée} pour sa piété et sa loyauté.
languages.original_text: Swayed by the promises of the xenos infestation, {name} von Valancius received the Genestealer's Kiss and joined the Congregation of the Ravenous Star. {mf|He|She} let the sweetness of genetic perfection into {mf|his|her} flesh, and let the songs of the blessed Angel into {mf|his|her} mind. As {mf|he|she} spread the Ravenous Star's teachings across worlds, ships, and stations, {mf|he|she} prayed for the Day of Liberation, the day the heavenly host of the Many-Armed Emperor arrives in the Expanse. On that glorious day of triumph, the Rogue Trader, as the first of His saints, will be greatly rewarded for {mf|his|her} piety and loyalty.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Appâté|Appâtée} par les promesses de l'infestation xénos, {name} von Valancius reçut le baiser du Genestealer et rejoignit la congrégation de l'Étoile vorace. {mf|Il|Elle} accueillit dans sa chair la suavité de la perfection génétique et dans son esprit les chants de l'ange béni. À mesure qu'{mf|il|elle} propageait les enseignements de sa nouvelle religion à travers les mondes, les vaisseaux et les stations, {mf|il|elle} priait ardemment pour qu'advienne le jour de la Délivrance, celui où l'armée céleste de l'Empereur aux mille bras arriverait dans les Étendues. En ce jour de gloire, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, {mf|le premier|la première} de Ses saints, serait généreusement {mf|récompensé|récompensée} pour sa piété et sa loyauté.

languages.text: {name} von Valancius se dejó convencer por las promesas de la infestación xenos y recibió el Beso del Genestealer, uniéndose a la Congregación de la Estrella Voraz. Dejó que la dulce perfección genética penetrara su carne y los cantos del bendito Ángel llenaran su mente. Mientras propagaba las enseñanzas de la Estrella Voraz por mundos, naves y estaciones, rezaba por la llegada del Día de la Liberación, cuando la celestial hueste del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos llegaría a la Extensión. En ese glorioso día triunfal, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, como primer{mf|o|a} de Sus santos, recibirá una gran recompensa por su piedad y lealtad.
languages.original_text: Swayed by the promises of the xenos infestation, {name} von Valancius received the Genestealer's Kiss and joined the Congregation of the Ravenous Star. {mf|He|She} let the sweetness of genetic perfection into {mf|his|her} flesh, and let the songs of the blessed Angel into {mf|his|her} mind. As {mf|he|she} spread the Ravenous Star's teachings across worlds, ships, and stations, {mf|he|she} prayed for the Day of Liberation, the day the heavenly host of the Many-Armed Emperor arrives in the Expanse. On that glorious day of triumph, the Rogue Trader, as the first of His saints, will be greatly rewarded for {mf|his|her} piety and loyalty.

traits.locale_text: {name} von Valancius se dejó convencer por las promesas de la infestación xenos y recibió el Beso del Genestealer, uniéndose a la Congregación de la Estrella Voraz. Dejó que la dulce perfección genética penetrara su carne y los cantos del bendito Ángel llenaran su mente. Mientras propagaba las enseñanzas de la Estrella Voraz por mundos, naves y estaciones, rezaba por la llegada del Día de la Liberación, cuando la celestial hueste del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos llegaría a la Extensión. En ese glorioso día triunfal, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, como primer{mf|o|a} de Sus santos, recibirá una gran recompensa por su piedad y lealtad.

languages.text: 異種族の侵入という現実に動揺させられた{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、ジーンスティーラーの口づけを受けて鴉星の信徒団に入団した。{mf|彼|彼女}はその肉体に遺伝子の完全性の素晴らしさをしみ込ませ、祝福された天使の歌をその精神へと吹き込む。{mf|彼|彼女}が世界に、船内に、ステーションに鴉星の教えを広めながら、{mf|彼|彼女}は解放の日を、数多の武器持つ皇帝の天の軍勢がエクスパンスに到着する日が来ることを祈った。その輝かしい勝利の日に、ローグトレーダーはその信心と忠誠により、聖徒の第一人者として大いに報われることだろう。
languages.original_text: Swayed by the promises of the xenos infestation, {name} von Valancius received the Genestealer's Kiss and joined the Congregation of the Ravenous Star. {mf|He|She} let the sweetness of genetic perfection into {mf|his|her} flesh, and let the songs of the blessed Angel into {mf|his|her} mind. As {mf|he|she} spread the Ravenous Star's teachings across worlds, ships, and stations, {mf|he|she} prayed for the Day of Liberation, the day the heavenly host of the Many-Armed Emperor arrives in the Expanse. On that glorious day of triumph, the Rogue Trader, as the first of His saints, will be greatly rewarded for {mf|his|her} piety and loyalty.

traits.locale_text: 異種族の侵入という現実に動揺させられた{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、ジーンスティーラーの口づけを受けて鴉星の信徒団に入団した。{mf|彼|彼女}はその肉体に遺伝子の完全性の素晴らしさをしみ込ませ、祝福された天使の歌をその精神へと吹き込む。{mf|彼|彼女}が世界に、船内に、ステーションに鴉星の教えを広めながら、{mf|彼|彼女}は解放の日を、数多の武器持つ皇帝の天の軍勢がエクスパンスに到着する日が来ることを祈った。その輝かしい勝利の日に、ローグトレーダーはその信心と忠誠により、聖徒の第一人者として大いに報われることだろう。

languages.text: {name}·冯·瓦兰修斯听信了异形的话语，接受了基因窃取者之吻，加入了饥渴之星教会。{mf|他|她}允许甜蜜的完美基因注入{mf|他|她}的身体，让祝福天使的歌声进入{mf|他|她}的心灵。{mf|他|她}将饥渴之星的教义传播到无数世界、舰船与星站，祈祷着解放之日到来，期盼四臂神皇的天军早日抵达科罗努斯扩区。当光辉灿烂的胜利之日到来时，虔敬而忠诚的行商浪人，作为四臂神皇众多首席圣徒之中的一员，将会得到无与伦比的赏赐。
languages.original_text: Swayed by the promises of the xenos infestation, {name} von Valancius received the Genestealer's Kiss and joined the Congregation of the Ravenous Star. {mf|He|She} let the sweetness of genetic perfection into {mf|his|her} flesh, and let the songs of the blessed Angel into {mf|his|her} mind. As {mf|he|she} spread the Ravenous Star's teachings across worlds, ships, and stations, {mf|he|she} prayed for the Day of Liberation, the day the heavenly host of the Many-Armed Emperor arrives in the Expanse. On that glorious day of triumph, the Rogue Trader, as the first of His saints, will be greatly rewarded for {mf|his|her} piety and loyalty.

traits.locale_text: {name}·冯·瓦兰修斯听信了异形的话语，接受了基因窃取者之吻，加入了饥渴之星教会。{mf|他|她}允许甜蜜的完美基因注入{mf|他|她}的身体，让祝福天使的歌声进入{mf|他|她}的心灵。{mf|他|她}将饥渴之星的教义传播到无数世界、舰船与星站，祈祷着解放之日到来，期盼四臂神皇的天军早日抵达科罗努斯扩区。当光辉灿烂的胜利之日到来时，虔敬而忠诚的行商浪人，作为四臂神皇众多首席圣徒之中的一员，将会得到无与伦比的赏赐。

languages.text: Zeno istilası vaatlerinin tesiri altında kalan {name} von Valancius, Gençalan'ın Busesi'ni kabul ederek Doymak Bilmez Yıldız Cemaati'ne katıldı. Genetik mükemmelliğin o tatlı hissinin etine nüfuz etmesine göz yumdu ve kutsanmış Melek'in şarkılarına zihnini açtı. Dört bir yandaki dünyalarda, gemilerde ve istasyonlarda Doymak Bilmez Yıldız'ın öğretilerini yayarken Çok Kollu İmparator ordusunun Enginlik'e varacağı ilahi Azat Günü'nün gelişi için dua etti. Hür Tacir, işte o şanlı zafer gününde Onun ilk azizlerinden biri olarak dindarlığı ve sadakati karşılığında cömertçe ödüllendirilecek.
languages.original_text: Swayed by the promises of the xenos infestation, {name} von Valancius received the Genestealer's Kiss and joined the Congregation of the Ravenous Star. {mf|He|She} let the sweetness of genetic perfection into {mf|his|her} flesh, and let the songs of the blessed Angel into {mf|his|her} mind. As {mf|he|she} spread the Ravenous Star's teachings across worlds, ships, and stations, {mf|he|she} prayed for the Day of Liberation, the day the heavenly host of the Many-Armed Emperor arrives in the Expanse. On that glorious day of triumph, the Rogue Trader, as the first of His saints, will be greatly rewarded for {mf|his|her} piety and loyalty.
